articles.author: Nathan Rennolds,George Glover
articles.title: Chinese electric car maker BYD is about to steal Tesla's crown. Here's why it's winning the race.
articles.description: China's BYD is almost certain to sell more electric cars worldwide in the final quarter of 2023 and take pole position over Tesla for the first time.
articles.content:
BYD's Seagull hatchback sells for the equivalent of just over $10,000.Aly Song/Reuters
